name: Clusia nascimentojuniorii
locality: Nova Prainha, Rio Aripuaná, projeto RADAM/BRASIL, SBZOZB, ponto 15
remarks: doi:10.1600/036364421X16231782047523 The specific epithet honours José Elvinodo Nascimento-Júnior, husband of Ana Cláudia Alencar, and an enthusiastic botanist, taxonomist, assistant professor at the Federal University of São João del-Rei, and specialist in the genus Clusia.
